name: Pink Princess Dress
description: A beautiful pink dress perfect for any princess. Made with soft cotton and lace accents, ideal for parties and special events.

name: Blue Denim Dress
description: A stylish and comfortable denim dress with a flared skirt. Great for casual outings and everyday wear.

name: Floral Summer Dress
description: A lightweight summer dress with a vibrant floral print. Perfect for sunny days at the park or beach.

name: Red Velvet Holiday Dress
description: A luxurious red velvet dress perfect for the holidays or any formal occasion. Features a bow tie at the back for a festive look.

name: Green Polka Dot Dress
description: A cute green dress with white polka dots, perfect for any fun outing. Features puff sleeves and a bow in the front.

name: Yellow Tulle Party Dress
description: A beautiful yellow tulle dress with sparkling details, ideal for birthday parties or any special celebration.

name: White Lace Flower Girl Dress
description: An elegant white lace dress perfect for flower girls or formal events. The dress features a satin sash and intricate lace detailing.

name: Purple Little Fairy Dress
description: A magical purple fairy dress with glittery wings. Perfect for dress-up and imaginative play, or as a costume for a fairy-themed party.

name: Black Velvet Dress
description: A classic black velvet dress with a delicate bow at the back. Ideal for family gatherings or formal occasions.

name: Pink Flower Print Dress
description: A cute pink dress with flower prints, perfect for casual wear in the spring or summer. Features a comfortable elastic waist.
